formAdvancedOptions.miscSettingsDesc: Other possible settings to be applied to the Notebook Server.

formAffinityTolerations.affinityTolerationsDesc: Configure the Notebook's Affinity and Tolerations.

formConfiguration.configurationDesc: Extra layers of configurations that will be applied to the new Notebook. (e.g. Insert credentials as Secrets, set Environment Variables.)

formDataVolumes.dataVolumesDesc: Configure the Volumes to be mounted as your Datasets.

formGpus.gpusDesc: Specify the number and Vendor of GPUs that will be assigned to the Notebook Server's Container.
formGpus.errorGpuVendorNotFound: No {{vendoruiName}} GPU found installed in the cluster.
formGpus.errorGpuVendorRequired: You must also specify the GPU Vendor for the assigned GPUs

formImage.frmImageDescription: A starter Jupyter Docker Image with a baseline deployment and typical ML packages
formImage.errorImageRequired: Please provide and Image to use

formName.nameDesc: Specify the name of the Notebook Server and the Namespace it will belong to.

formSpecs.cpuDesc: Specify the total amount of CPU and RAM reserved by your Notebook Server. For CPU-intensive workloads, you can choose more than 1 CPU (e.g. 1.5).

formWorkspaceVolume.workspaceVolumeDesc: Configure the Volume to be mounted as your personal Workspace.
formWorkspaceVolume.ckbNoPersistent: Don't use Persistent Storage for User's home
formWorkspaceVolume.msgNoPersistent: Your workspace will not be persistent. You will lose all data in it, if your notebook is terminated for any reason.

volume.errorMountedVolume: The volume is already mounted to another notebook and cannot be currently selected

resourceForm.msgDefaultStorageClass: No default Storage Class is set. Can't create new Disks for the new Notebook. Please use an Existing Disk.

dialog.deleteDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this notebook server? {{name}}
dialog.deleteDialogMessage: Warning: Your data might be lost if the notebook server is not backed by persistent storage
dialog.stopDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to stop this notebook server? {{name}}
dialog.stopDialogMessage: Warning: Your data might be lost if the notebook server is not backed by persistent storage

status.errorEvent: An error has occured. Check 'kubectl describe pod' for more information
status.noPodsRunning: No Pods are currently running for this Notebook Server.
status.waitingStatus: Current status is waiting. Check 'kubectl describe pod' for more information

namespaceInput.namePattern: Name must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-', start with an alphabetic character, and end with an alphanumeric character

backend.errorConnectBackend: Could not connect to the backend.

dialog.deleteVolumeDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this volume? {{name}}
dialog.deleteVolumeDialogMessage: Warning: All data in this volume will be lost.

status.unavailableStatus: Pending: This volume will be bound when its first consumer is created. E.g., when you first browse its contents, or attach it to a notebook server

backend.serverReady: The Tensorboard server is ready to connect
backend.serverUnavailable: The Tensorboard server is currently unavailble
